brief.content-text:
Diagram 4, Animation
The diagram identifies a T IA/EIA 568A Crossover cable connecting two similar interfaces, a PC on the left and another PC on the right. The transmit and receive wire pairs are swapped at either end of the cable

Left PC end of cable:
One.Green/White, Transmit.
Two.Green, Transmit.
Three.Orange/White, Receive.
Four.Blue.
Five.Blue/White.
Six.Orange, Receive.
Seven.Brown/White.
Eight.Brown.

Right PC end of cable:
One.Orange/White, Transmit.
Two.Orange, Transmit.
Three.Green/White, Receive.
Four.Blue.
Five.Blue/White.
Six.Green, Receive.
Seven.Brown/White.
Eight.Brown.
